title: Rainy night city driving with a bus and a car on the road.
caption: A car driving on a rainy night in a city with a bus and other cars on the road.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.1 m/s). There are 25 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The video shows a car driving on a rainy night in a city with a bus and other cars on the road. The road is wet and the visibility is low due to the rain. The traffic is moderate and the vehicles are moving slowly. The streetlights are on and the buildings are lit up. The video captures the sound of the rain and the wipers of the car.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on the rainy city street because of the low visibility and the wet road. The driver is being cautious and following the other vehicles on the road. The bus and the other cars are also moving slowly due to the rainy conditions. The driver is keeping a safe distance from the other vehicles and adjusting the speed according to the traffic flow. The video shows the importance of driving carefully and being aware of the surroundings during rainy conditions.
